metadata.title: Surf Strength | 4-Week Training Program
metadata.description: Functional strength training designed for surfers. Build paddle power, pop-up explosiveness, and rotational strength.

hero.badge: Designed for surfers who train smart
hero.srTitle: Surf Workout Program: 4-Week Strength Training for Surfers -
hero.description: A surf-first strength, mobility, and shoulder-health program built to make you

socialProof.quote: Designed for surfers who want to stay {light}, {mobile}, and {powerful} — in and out of the water.

problem.label: The Problem
problem.description: Traditional gym programs are built for size and symmetry — not paddling endurance, balance, or shoulder longevity. Surfers run into the same problems over and over.

problems.legs: Heavy legs that feel dead in the water
problems.strength: Strength that doesn't translate to the board
problems.programs: Programs that leave you sore instead of surf-ready

solution.label: The Solution
solution.description: This program was designed around the real demands of surfing — every exercise earns its place based on carryover to the water, not gym aesthetics.

sessionIncludes.strength: Strength that supports paddling and pop-ups
sessionIncludes.progression: Clear progression without chasing heavier weights

equipment.label: Fully Customizable
equipment.description: Traveling? Limited equipment? No problem. Tell the app what gear you have access to, and it automatically adapts every workout with smart exercise substitutions.

features.smartSubstitutionsDesc: exercises swap automatically based on your equipment
features.sameResultsDesc: surf-specific benefits preserved regardless of setup
features.changeAnytimeDesc: update your gear as your setup evolves

equipment.adaptNote: Workouts adapt instantly to your selections

items.unilateral: Unilateral work for balance and control

items.works: Works with dumbbells, kettlebells, bands, or bodyweight

yes.feel: Want to feel lighter and faster in the water
yes.train: Train with whatever equipment you have

no.maxLifts: You want to max out lifts

items.balance: Better balance when the board gets unstable
items.strength: Strength that feels useful, not heavy

features.guided: Guided workouts with clear sets, reps, tempo

pricing.label: Get Started
pricing.instant: Instant access • Works on all devices

equipment.a: The program adapts to your available gear. You can train with just bodyweight, add resistance bands, dumbbells, kettlebells, or a pull-up bar. Tell the app what you have, and it automatically adjusts every exercise to match your setup.

bulky.a: No. The program is specifically designed to improve strength without adding unnecessary mass. You'll get stronger and more functional, not bigger.

repeat.a: Yes — it's built to be cycled again and again, with small, sustainable progressions. Many surfers run this year-round.

surfVolume.q: What if I surf a lot one week?
surfVolume.a: The volume is flexible. You'll learn how to adjust sessions around swell. The app tracks your progress so you can pick up where you left off.

gym.a: No gym required. The program works with minimal equipment and adapts to what you have — perfect for home workouts, garage gyms, or training while traveling.

duration.a: Each session is 40-50 minutes including warm-up and mobility work. No wasted time, no fluff.

finalCta.description: Stronger paddles. Faster pop-ups. Healthier shoulders.

blog.title: SURF TRAINING
blog.description: Expert insights on building surf-specific strength, preventing injuries, and improving your performance in the water.
blog.metaDescription: Expert articles on surf fitness, strength training for surfers, injury prevention, and how to improve your performance in the water.
blog.noPosts: No posts yet. Check back soon!
blog.ctaDescription: Put these concepts into practice with our complete 4-week surf strength program.

workouts.title: SURF-SPECIFIC STRENGTH
workouts.description: 4 weeks of functional training designed to improve your paddling power, pop-up speed, and rotational strength. No bulk, just performance.
workouts.equipmentNote: Exercises are automatically adjusted based on your available equipment. The workout intensity and surf-specific benefits remain the same.

rir.title: RIR (Reps In Reserve)
rir.description: RIR tells you how hard to push each set. It's how many more reps you could have done with good form.
rir.recommendation: RIR 2-3 is the sweet spot for most exercises - challenging but sustainable.
